standardparameter.name: Lota (l)
standardparameter.description: Maximal length of subsequence with same colour. Is a hard constraint, not allowed to violate.

standardparameter.name: Beta (b)
standardparameter.description: Weight for the number of PRC violations.

standardparameter.name: Gamma (y)
standardparameter.description: Weight for the number of NPRC violations.

standardparameter.name: Zeta (z)
standardparameter.description: Positive parameter for the relaxation mechanism (chapter 2.2.1).

standardparameter.name: Eta (n)
standardparameter.description: Eta = min {n, 200} and every pair of positions (i,j) is in fact considered every Eta iterations.

standardparameter.name: My (u)
standardparameter.description: An random integer in [0,Eta - 1]. Every pair (i, j) will be assigned to one My. At every iteration t the pair is only considered for a move when My(i,j) = t (mod Eta). The My values are themself regenerated every Eta iterations.

standardparameter.name: Theta (O)
standardparameter.description: Reinserting forbidden for Theta iterations for the type 1 of moving. Exception is allowed when a solution is found which is better than the best one at this moment. For the reswapping the same.

standardparameter.name: Kappa (k)
standardparameter.description: Stopping criterion; describes the amount of iterations without an improvement of f(s).

standardparameter.name: Chi (X)
standardparameter.description: Perturbation mechanism - Random swaps: 3 random pairs where i != j are swapped.

standardparameter.name: Tau (t)
standardparameter.description: Perturbation mechanism - Random shuffling within a subsequence: selection of a subsequence with the length Tau and shuffling them randomly.

standardparameter.name: Pi
standardparameter.description: Perturbation mechanism - Application of all improving swaps and of a proportion Pi of neutral swaps
